topic.title: Chief Complaint And Reason For Visit Section - conformance rules

lines.i: This section records the patient's chief complaint (the patient's own description) and/or the reason for the patient's visit (the provider's description of the reason for visit). Local policy determines whether the information is divided into two sections or recorded in one section serving both purposes.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7840, CONF:10383 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.13"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15449)/@code="46239-0" Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15450)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15449)/@code="46239-0" Chief Complaint and Reason for Visit (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15450)
